code: import React from'react';import{Input,Button,VStack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoInput(_ref){let{addTodo,newTodo,setNewTodo}=_ref;const handleAddTodo=()=>{if(newTodo.trim()!==''){addTodo(newTodo);setNewTodo('');}};const handleKeyDown=event=>{if(event.key==='Enter'){handleAddTodo();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{spacing:4,width:"100%",align:"stretch",mb:8,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"Enter a new todo",value:newTodo,onChange:e=>setNewTodo(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown,variant:"filled",size:"lg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleAddTodo,colorScheme:"brand",size:"lg",children:"\uD83E\uDDE0 \u2192 \uD83D\uDCF1"})]});}export default TodoInput;
